subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ahhh the infamous Fish!
author: black bear hollow
full_text:
No, Erland did tangle with them. I talked to him about it often and he  
helped me an awful lot. Sure do miss him.

w.
On Aug 17, 2008, at 4:29 PM, Lisby wrote:

> I don't think Erland was the one bothered with them. Bill  
> something...I can't remember his last name. And Charlie with the  
> ghost coffee pot. She got them, too.


No, E land did angle wi h hem. I alked o him abou i o en and he helped me an aw ul lo . Su e do miss him.Â w.On Aug 17, 2008, a 4:29 PM, Lisby w o e:I don' hink E land was he one bo he ed wi h hem. Bill some hing...I can' emembe his las name. And Cha lie wi h he ghos co ee po . She go hem, oo.
